colors.title: What is the meaning of the colours?
colors.description: Every colour represents the age of the note

descriptions.darkgreen: Between one second and one day
descriptions.amber: Between six months and one year

multipleUsers.title: Is it possible to search for multiple users?
multipleUsers.description:
!HTML! Yes, by using a comma to separate each user.
When searching for the author of a note, it will try to find notes that were opened by any of the given users.
When searching for the users of a note, it will try to find notes that all of the given users commented on.

excludingUsers.title: Is it possible to exclude certain users?
excludingUsers.description:
!HTML! Yes, by writing either NOT or - in front of the user to exclude.
It is also possible to exclude multiple users by separating each user with a comma.

outdatedNotes.title: Why do some notes appear to be outdated?
outdatedNotes.description:
!HTML! All notes are synchronized every 5 minutes with the OpenStreetMap API. It can happen that notes or comments which have been hidden by the moderators still appear in the results.
This is mainly due to the fact that the underlying API of OpenStreetMap does not directly offer the possibility to know which notes and comments have been hidden by moderators. As a result, the complete notes dump is analyzed from time to time in irregular intervals in order to find and fix these anomalies.
If you want to know the last time the manual synchronization was performed, take a look at the status page with regard to the value of last_import (for comments) or last_sync (for notes).
